channel.title: ClashX Pro
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• Update to latest clash core and bring follow updates:
    • add lazy for proxy group and provider
    • more detailed error when dial failed
    • log rule msg on dial error
    • add disable-udp option for all proxy group
  • Fix issue causing port open fail at launch.
  • Fix clashX can not quit successfully at some case.
  • Fix set start at login crash when using m1 devices.
  • Support apple silicon
